column5: I see that most vids are posted with the video showing,you just have to click on the play button.How do you do it? I always goof it up. Thanks  Oh, Im back as bro has to work,but it was a few great days. Post when I get my vid help.LOL
At the bottom of where you post there's something called "post options". Set it to HTML ON.
Thanks Roy. Hope alls well me,ducky.

Yep...use the embed code from wherever the video is being hosted.  I use the HTML Auto Line Break option...that way line spaces are already put in for you.  If links show up anywhere in that code, then you have to remove them.  Highlight those sections and click on the button near the top that shows the letter A underlined to remove formatting.  You should be good to go from there.
As you can see it worked. Thanks fellas.
